CustomField.description: This text field needs to be filled in case when Sales Phse is 'Closed' and Sales Outcome Reason is 'Other' 16th Jan: as per recent discussion renaming the label to be "Learnings and Best Practices"
CustomField.inlineHelpText: From your case specific perspective, what is your most important recommendation to help Nokia win a similar case next time?
CustomField.label: Win/Loss Insights
